name: Magna Vulpes
description:
Team game made by the team "K9 Unity" of which I was part. My main role was programmer (including AI), but I've also done UI/UX, technical design, builds, gameplay and various small tasks within development process.

The game has been made for our client, Liminal VR, based in Australia

The story of Magna Vulpes follows a mother fox. The Player controls this fox as she ventures into the forest to find her missing fox cubs. Along the way she also have to collect 20 fruits. Once all her cubs are found she must get them back to their den.
